thread.section_title: Cruise Sale Finder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruise Sale Finder | www.cruisesalefinder.co.nz
thread.title: Susan
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: I found them very easy to deal with, just a short wait on the phone to speak to a consultant plus the fact that they have English as a first language is a bonus as I did not have to repeat myself which I have found necessary when trying to book through P & O. Would definitely book thru here again.
